attributes.action: Greville Wynne acknowledge his work for the UK and the West.
attributes.additional_details: Greville Wynne couriered Soviet secrets to the West and ended up languishing in a soviet jail - starved and tourtured. Whilst he was alive he was not acknowledged for his services. If the Queen can give Tony Blar the highest honours I believe she should give similar to someone who has actually done something for the UK. I am amazed his sacrifices have never been acknowledged
attributes.background: I would like the UK Government to award the family of Greville Wynne an MBE or something for his services to the UK and the West in general.

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
